headline: Fintech Rain Raises $58 Million to Fuel Stablecoin Push on Visa Network
summary: American fintech Rain, which issues cards backed by stablecoins, has raised a total of $88.5 million.

headline: 5 Financial Transaction Stocks in Focus Amid Strong Cross-Border Volumes
summary: The Financial Transaction Services industry is gaining on the widespread adoption of digital means, strong consumer spending and pursuit of M&A activities. Companies like V, MA, FI, PYPL and WEX are well-positioned to thrive on the back of these favorable trends.

headline: AGs attack deepfake porn payments
summary: Apple, Visa and others must be “more aggressive” in banning payment authorization for nonconsensual deepfake content, state AGs told the companies.

raw.headline: AGs attack deepfake porn payments

headline: Is Visa’s 31% Rally Justified After Recent Payment Volume Growth?
summary: Thinking about adding Visa to your portfolio, or maybe wondering if now is the right time to hold or trim your position? You are not alone. Visa’s stock is one of those ever-present blue chips that draws in investors with both its global brand power and steady long-term gains. Over the past year, Visa has jumped an impressive 31.1%. For those with even longer-term horizons, the return since 2019 stands at more than 67%. Despite a minor 1.4% dip over the past month, the stock has still gained...

headline: Stablecoin payments might not threaten Visa and Mastercard, but consumers are still winners
summary: Rather than heralding a coming battle in the payments business, stablecoins are shaping up to be another part of the industry's mix.
